AI-Assisted Interface Design: A Framework for Human-AI Collaboration

Chen Yifan, Zhang Wei, Wang Xiaoli, Li Ming

Proceedings of CHI 2024 â€¢ 2024 â€¢ 1-14

This paper presents a novel framework for human-AI collaboration in interface design, enabling designers to work effectively with AI systems while preserving creative control and design intent.

Cognitive Load Assessment in Mobile Information Interfaces: An Eye-tracking Study

Li Ming, Zhang Wei, Liu Yanfei, Chen Xiaoming

International Journal of Human-Computer Studies â€¢ 2023 â€¢ 102-118

We present a novel approach to measuring cognitive load in mobile information interfaces using eye-tracking metrics, providing designers with objective measures for interface optimization.
